|brand = Ctera |model = CT-C200 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -1 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 4 August 2020 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Ctera_C200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = YT300B-1.6 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6281; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv5 |cpu1_type_rev = (Kirkwood) |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 800 MHz / 1.0 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;K9F2G08U0C-SCB0; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU128M8GE-AC; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1116R; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:25:25
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA II, |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sata_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J3 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery backup, fan, |addchip = 2-Wire RTC IC;Seiko;S35390A;;1;,,, USB 2.0 Controller;NEC;UPD720114;;1;,,, Digital Temperature Sensor w/ Fan Control;National Semiconductor;LM63;;1;,,, Synchronous Single Buck PMW Controller;Chip Advanced Tech;CAT7581;;1;,,, 1A Low Dropout Voltage Regulator;GlobalTech;GS1117AX;;1;,,, 2A, 18V Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1482DS;;2;,,, 0.5A Dual Channel Current-Limited Power Switch;Diodes Inc;AP2146;;1;,,, P-Channel Power MOSFET;Advanced Power Electronics;AP9435GM;;2;,,, 30V Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AO4842;;1;,,, Precision Timer;TI;NE555;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = SerComm |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = 2022 |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 10/2009 |estprice = 499 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00OJMPNY8 |asin_country = CA |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *[[Marvell]] 1.2GHz ARM CPU, RAM 512MB DDR2, 256MB Flash, 1x GbE LAN *2x 3.5" HDD SATA I/II (up to 4TB, total 8TB), RAID 0/1/JBOD, 2x USB 2.0
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/cloud/cloud-storage/126-ctera-c200-reviewed ''CTERA C200 Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''']
